lines.text: Do you, uh, do you see anybody, do you see anybody in Las Vegas?

Well, I don't have any ties there, if that's what you mean. It's sunny there, but nobody really gets tan because everyone stays inside all the time. Here you have the ocean and the breeze, all those boats. See, that's why I'm studying to get my manicurist's license. So if I ever decide to move, I could have a trade.
